revised_title: Determination of the Electrostatic Units in the Electromagnetic Unit
tldr: The authors describe experiments conducted at Glasgow University to determine the relationship between the electromagnetic and electrostatic units of measurement. They also provide a summary of similar observations made by W.P. King in 1867 and 1868. The results show that the ratio of the electromagnetic and electrostatic units is a velocity, which is crucial in the electromagnetic theory of light.
